attributes.action: Re-run any parliamentary election where abstention is the majority of votes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we take an abstention as effectively saying non-of the above, it is undemocratic to return a candidate that does not represent the will of the majority of the electorate. Seats where this accounts for the majority of electorate's actions should not return an MP and the election should be re-run.
